# Smallholder Farm Soil Map Accuracy Assessment in Ghana

[![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/jjmaynard/Ghana.SoilMap.Accuracy/master?urlpath=rstudio)

This repository contains the data and code for our paper:

> Maynard, J. J., Yeboah, E., Owusu, S., Buenemann, M., Neff, J. C. and Herrick, J. E.: Accuracy of regional-to-global soil maps for on-farm decision making: Are soil maps “good enough”?, SOIL, accepted, 2023

Our pre-print is online here:

> Maynard, J. J., Yeboah, E., Owusu, S., Buenemann, M., Neff, J. C. and Herrick, J. E.: Accuracy of regional-to-global soil maps for on-farm decision making: Are soil maps “good enough”?, EGUsphere, preprint(May), 1–35 [online] Available from: https://doi.org/10.5194/egusphere-2022-246, 2022.
